column4: whats the Difference between dapper 6.06 And edgy 6.10 ? becoz i am new i just install Ubuntu6.06. but now i try to run edgy6.10 from cdrom.. its look like same as dapper-drake ?
Can i Shift my Ubuntu6.06 to Edgy? i have a Edgy CD.
i d0nt want to upgrade my 6.06 to edgy c0z i d0nt have bandwidth or high speed connection.. i just want to upgrade my edgy through CD?
there are instructions there. You'll still have to download the CD though
I just want to tell you that unless you have a broken "o" key, seriously don't use zer0.
i just want to upgrade my 6.06 to edgy from Cd.
you can backup your files and reinstall from scratch, otherwise you're out of luck.
because you need the Edgy Alternate CD in order to do an upgrade.
if you're unwilling to download an additional ISO or perform an internet upgrade, you'll have to install Edgy from scratch.
if i just use my 6.06 version partition for edgy .. then edgy format it self its valid way?
edgy will overwrite your data. You'll need to back it up before installing Edgy
i d0nt have anything on that partition just Except Ubuntu dapper-drake
yes in that partition i just have Ubuntu-dapper files .. not any my personal fiels
in that case, you can go ahead and install. You should back up your /home folder, unless it's already on a separate partition, because that contains all your program settings and stuff.
i am using Redhat linux too.. But using Ubuntu grub. is there any problem if i use edgy on that partition?
